title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for stating “false.”

  • One point is earned for the explanation that the profit-maximizing output occurs where P = MC, which might be to the right or to the left of the lowest point on the ATC curve.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points:

  • One point is earned for stating “false.”

  • One point is earned for the explanation that if the firm shuts down in the short run, its losses from operating must be larger than (or equal to) its total fixed costs OR price must be less than AVC, so it is incurring a loss.
